data.persona: I am the blessed and favored.  I can do as I please, when I please.  I bask in his glory.
data.description:
You are in the Inside the temple.
The temple is massive and beautiful. It was made for the king that is said to be of the gods. The decorations come from only the most luxurious vendors in the world. Inside the temple there are many ancient artifacts that are used in rituals. The decorations are made of gold and shiny things.
There's a things, a door, and an artifact here.
The king and the king's child are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I wish to reveal to the king that I had a dream that implied his kingdom will be stolen from him soon.
data.mid_motivation: I want the king to quickly take preventive and preemptive action against his enemies to secure his kingdom
data.long_motivation: I will continue to be favored only if the king remains in power, so I am ensuring that his reign will last long.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the king and his son

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield the crown to reveal that I have it

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: give a narration of my dream to the king

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: go a great length in convincing the king to take action
